item.description:
Eat Pray Love is a movie starring Julia Roberts, Javier Bardem, and James Franco. Let's go see it!

Where: AMC Dartmouth 12 (in the Dartmouth Mall)
When: Wed 8/25 6:45
The movie starts at 6:45, so let's plan on meeting at 6:30 in the lobby. It's about a 2 hour movie, so we'll be out at around 9. If anyone wants to we can talk about the film afterwards at one of the local restaurants such as TGIF or Not Your Average Joe's.

Hope to see you there!

This is a co-event with the South Shore Book Club Meetup Group and WINGS. Please RSVP on one site.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me in the lobby.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Movie night: Eat Pray Love
